testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for UPCOMING_BILLS Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight that lists upcoming recurring bills within a configured time period.

testDescription: Validate GET Customer Subscription for BILL_NOT_PAID Insight
insightDescription: Generates an insight if a recurring bill has not been paid for more than a configured number of days.

insightDescription: Generates an insight when a recurring bill changes by more than a configured threshold.

insightDescription: Generates an insight that provides net worth trends over a configured time period.

insightDescription: Generates an insight to inform the user how the user has spent in the last month compared to his historical average

insightDescription: Generates an insight that provides spending trends (based on $ amount) by category over a configured time period.
